def count_pairs_with_kth_bit_set(arr, queries):
    n = len(arr)
    matrix = [[0 for _ in range(60)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(60):
            if arr[i] & 1:
                matrix[i][j] += 1
                if i != 0:
                    matrix[i][j] += matrix[i - 1][j]
            else:
                matrix[i][j] += matrix[i - 1][j]
            arr[i] >>= 1
    results = []
    for query in queries:
        (k, l1, r1, l2, r2) = query
        l1 += 1
        r1 -= 1
        l2 -= 1
        r2 -= 1
        ans1 = matrix[r1][k] if l1 == 0 else matrix[r1][k] - matrix[l1 - 1][k]
        ans2 = r1 - l1 + 1 - ans1
        ans3 = matrix[r2][k] - matrix[l2 - 1][k]
        ans4 = r2 - l2 + 1 - ans3
        results.append(ans1 * ans4 + ans2 * ans3)
    return results

    matrix = [[0 for _ in range(60)] for _ in range(n)]
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(60):
            if arr[i] & 1:
                matrix[i][j] += 1
                if i != 0:
                    matrix[i][j] += matrix[i - 1][j]
            else:
                matrix[i][j] += matrix[i - 1][j]
            arr[i] >>= 1
    results = []
    for query in queries:
        (k, l1, r1, l2, r2) = query
        l1 -= 1
        r1 -= 1
        l2 -= 1
        r2 -= 1
        ans1 = matrix[r1][k] if l1 == 0 else matrix[r1][k] - matrix[l1 - 1][k]
        ans2 = r1 - l1 + 1 - ans1
        ans3 = matrix[r2][k] - matrix[l2 - 1][k]
        ans4 = r2 - l2 + 1 - ans3
        results.append(ans1 * ans4 - ans2 * ans3)
    return results
